bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of males and females dreaming of sexual intercourse with emission of essence. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 27: 男不可無女，女不可無男…強抑鬱閉之，難持易失，使人 漏精尿濁，以致鬼交之病 , “For men to be without a woman, that is impossible. For women to be without a male, that is impossible. …If [sexual desire] is pent-up with force, it will be difficult to hold and easy to lose. As a result, essence/semen will drip and urine will be turbid. In the end this leads to the disease of intercourse with demons ”.
